# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-102">Confirmaciones de lectura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-103">Para solicitar una confirmación de lectura o una confirmación de entrega del mensaje en Outlook en la web:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-104">Seleccione los puntos suspensivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-105">en la parte superior del panel de redacción del mensaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-106">Seleccione **Mostrar opciones de mensaje**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-107">Seleccione **solicitar confirmación de lectura** o **solicitar**confirmación de entrega o ambas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-108">Para elegir el modo en que Outlook responde a las solicitudes de confirmación de lectura, vaya a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-109">**Configuración** > **ver todo** > el**control de mensajes**de la configuración de Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e1a4c-110">Para obtener más información, vea confirmaciones [de lectura en Outlook en la web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e1a4c-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
